name: Tower of Time (itch) (Nabi)
description:
It's a short rpg maker game about a person who becomes trapped in a tower with a strange crystal that can travel between the past, present, and future. 

This was made for the Lost Relic Game Jam. 

Many thanks to my friend Cynthia for making this!  You can find her on twitter @cyn_arts.

Note: 

  • It may take two tries for the crystal to work. If it doesn't work the first time, spam it again! 
  • The crystal quest is finicky. It might be a one-try thing. If it doesn't work, start a new game.
